announcements.title: Welcome to Arctyll
announcements.content: We're excited to launch our new website! Arctyll is dedicated to creating innovative Minecraft mods and tools for the community.
announcements.author: Arctyll Team

announcements.title: New Mod Release Coming Soon
announcements.content: We're working on an exciting new mod that will revolutionize how you play Minecraft. Stay tuned for more updates!
announcements.author: Development Team
